SELECT h.goods_desc,h.id, h.hf_name,h.resp_id, h.price_id,h1.hf_name productCategoryName, h1.id categoryId, h.create_time,h.modify_time,h.cancelId,h.claim, h.is_deleted FROM hf_goods h JOIN hf_category h1 ON h.category_id = h1.id
WHERE h.stone_id=#{stoneId}

SELECT h.id, h.price_id priceId, h.resp_id respId,
h3.sell_price, h3.line_price,
h.hf_name, h.goods_desc,
h4.quantity
FROM hf_goods h
JOIN hf_price h3 ON h3.googs_id = h.id
JOIN hf_resp h4 ON h4.googs_id = h.id
WHERE h.id = #{id}

SELECT h.goods_desc,h.id, h.hf_name,h.resp_id, h.price_id,h1.hf_name productCategoryName, h1.id categoryId,p.id productId, h.create_time,h.modify_time, h.is_deleted FROM hf_goods h JOIN product p ON h.product_id = p.id JOIN hf_category h1 ON h.category_id = h1.id WHERE h.stone_id=#{stoneId}
SELECT distinct id, instance_id, product_id, category_id, stone_id, boss_id, brand_id, resp_id, price_id, goods_desc, create_time,modify_time, is_deleted FROM hf_goods WHERE stone_id = #{stoneId}

SELECT product_desc goods_desc, p.id, p.hf_name, h.resp_id resp_id, h.price_id price_id, h1.hf_name productCategoryName, h1.id categoryId, p.id productId, p.boss_id stone_id, p.create_time, p.modify_time, h.cancel_id, h.claim, h.is_deleted, h2.file_id file_id, h3.sell_price FROM hf_goods h JOIN product p ON h.product_id = p.id JOIN hf_category h1 ON h.category_id = h1.id JOIN hf_price h3 ON h.price_id = h3.id left JOIN cancel h4 ON h.cancel_id = h4.id JOIN hf_goods_pictrue h2 ON h2.goods_id = h.id where p.id=#{goodsId} order by h3.sell_price limit 1;

SELECT h.goods_desc,h.id, h.hf_name,h.resp_id, h.price_id,h1.hf_name productCategoryName, h1.id categoryId,p.id productId,h.stone_id, h.create_time,h.modify_time, h.is_deleted FROM hf_goods h JOIN product p ON h.product_id = p.id JOIN hf_category h1 ON h.category_id = h1.id WHERE h.id=#{goodsId}

SELECT h.goods_desc,h.id, h.hf_name,h.resp_id, h.price_id,h2.sell_price, h1.id categoryId,p.id productId, h.create_time,h.modify_time, h.is_deleted,h1.hf_name productCategoryName FROM hf_goods h JOIN product p ON h.product_id = p.id JOIN hf_category h1 ON h.category_id = h1.id JOIN hf_price h2 ON h.price_id = h2.id WHERE 1=1
AND h.hf_name like '%${goodName}%'
AND h1.id = #{categoryId}
AND p.id = #{productId} ORDER BY sell_price

select b.goods_desc,b.id, b.hf_name goodName,b.resp_id, b.price_id,c.hf_name productCategoryName, c.id categoryId, a.sell_price,b.create_time, b.modify_time,b.is_deleted,b.cancel_id,b.claim from hf_price a LEFT JOIN hf_goods b on a.googs_id=b.id lEFT JOIN hf_category c on b.category_id =c.id where c.hf_name= #{productCategoryName} and #{sellPrice1} > a.sell_price >#{sellPrice2}

SELECT * FROM hf_goods h
JOIN hf_category h1 ON h.category_id = h1.id
JOIN seniority_instance h3 ON h.id = h3.goods_id JOIN hf_seniority h4 ON h4.id = h3.seniority_id
JOIN hf_price h2 ON h.price_id = h2.id where 1=1
and h.category_id = #{categoryId}
and h3.seniority_id = #{seniorityId} and h4.id = h3.seniority_id
ORDER BY h2.sell_price

SELECT * FROM hf_goods h
JOIN hf_category h1 ON h.category_id = h1.id
JOIN seniority_instance h3 ON h.id = h3.goods_id JOIN hf_seniority h4 ON h4.id = h3.seniority_id
JOIN hf_price h2 ON h.price_id = h2.id where 1=1
and h.category_id = #{categoryId}
and h3.seniority_id = #{seniorityId} and h4.id = h3.seniority_id
ORDER BY h2.sell_price DESC

SELECT h.goods_desc,h.id, h.hf_name,h.resp_id,h2.file_id, h.price_id,h1.hf_name productCategoryName, h1.id categoryId, h3.sell_price,h.create_time, h.modify_time,h.is_deleted,h.cancel_id,h.claim,h.member,h.evaluate FROM hf_goods h JOIN hf_category h1 ON h.category_id = h1.id JOIN hf_price h3 ON h.price_id = h3.id JOIN hf_goods_pictrue h2 ON h.id = h2.goods_id WHERE 1=1
and h.hf_name like '%${goodsName}%'
AND h1.hf_name like '%${productCategoryName}%'
